update dedup_check_detail
tran_id = #{tranId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
approve_time = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update dedup_check_detail set tran_id = #{tranId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, approve_time = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cstatus = #{cstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creason = #{creason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checker = #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, grand_parent_id = #{grandParentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from dedup_check_detail where cstatus = 0 AND parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by id limit 1

select
,tran_ops.type, tran_ops.learnPhase, tran_ops.subject, tran_ops.diff, tran_ops.knowledge, tran_ops.ops,tran_ops.source, tran_ops.url, tran_ops.status, tran_ops.audit_status, tran_ops.real_subject, tran_ops.content, tran_ops.answer, tran_ops.solution, tran_ops.remark, tran_ops.latex, tran_ops.answerLatex, tran_ops.create_time, tran_ops.operator_name, tran_ops.content_operator_name, tran_ops.operator_team_id, tran_ops.content_operator_team_id, tran_ops.orc_picture_id, tran_ops_approve.reason, tran_ops_approve.approvor from dedup_check_detail left join tran_ops on dedup_check_detail.tran_id = tran_ops.id left join tran_ops_approve on dedup_check_detail.tran_id = tran_ops_approve.tran_id and dedup_check_detail.approve_time = tran_ops_approve.approve_time where dedup_check_detail.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
